mapper.insert: insert into item(item_group_id, location, start_day, end_day, price, type, total_stock, total_sales_count, introduce, detail_img, discount_price, item_name) values (#{itemGroupId}, #{location}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{price}, #{type}, #{totalStock}, #{totalSalesCount}, #{introduce}, #{detailImg}, #{discountPrice}, #{itemName})
mapper.update: update item set item_group_id = #{itemGroupId}, location = #{location}, start_day = #{startDay}, end_day = #{endDay}, price = #{price}, type = #{type}, total_stock = #{totalStock}, total_sales_count = #{totalSalesCount}, introduce = #{introduce}, detail_img = #{detailImg}, discount_price = #{discountPrice}, item_name = #{itemName} where item_id = #{itemId}
